name: BANANA-SAN!
description:
RUN !

BANANA-SAN needs your help to escape MONKEY-SAMA ! You need to avoid kitchen furniture and punch you fellow fruit friends to move forward !

You can switch between the 3 different paths by clicking on any of them. When a fruit gets in front of him, BANANA-SAN punches him automatically.

Hitting obstacles makes you lose speed while punching fruits makes you faster !

How long can you last ?
